data.title: New Pizza Restaurant replaced old DQ
data.text:
This is my 1st 5***** review of a Pizza Restaurant.

Marco's offers dine-in / carryout / delivery / catering / 

Manager Tom & his teammates have a friendly "I'm here to serve you" attitude.  He said "10 minutes" & it was.  

Hand-tossed crust was light & possibly the best I've had.  Ingredients were larger than the usual tiny processed bits.  Sauce & cheese just right.  

Leftover slices were still tasty after being warmed up in the oven.

Decor package was very attractive & comfortable.  Shiny clean everywhere.  Inviting to dine-in.  Fast-growing chain based in Toledo OH.

data.title: Great Pizza and Subs
data.text: We've tried several pizzas and they are delicious and tasty.  The steak sub is really good.  The Italian sub is ok. It is easy to order on line and either have it delivered or pick it up. Restaurant is clean and attractive.  I give them a 4 because Cashiers should take the orders in the order they come, not take a phone order while your midway through your order at the register.

data.title: Great, always make it right
data.text: They accidentally cut my pizza wrong  ( square vs normal slices) so they made me another pizza without asking. They gave me both pizzas for the price of one!

data.title: Delicious
data.text: The best thin crust pizza in town.  Plenty of toppings, you can specify the amount of sauce the use from light to heavy.  Pizza and wings are delicious as well as the sub sandwiches. .  Well worth the price.

data.title: Average Pizza
data.text: This is your typical chain food restaurant. Average food, average price range, and a clean environment. Nothing special, but not bad either.

data.title: Good!
data.text: Pizza night for the family..I ordered cheesy bread & a brownie to go along with our meal..Everything was GOOD and hot! We had it delivered(was delivered before estimated time & driver was very friendly

data.title: A new pizza option!
data.text: We received a menu in the mail for the Marco's recently opened in Bartlett and gave it a try. We ordered the old world pepperoni and mushrooms on thin crust for delivery. The pizza came reasonably quickly, was quite good with generous toppings, and the mushrooms tasted freshly sliced. The sauce was a bit sweet for my taste, but that can be remedied by asking for less sauce. We look forward to trying other things on the menu, and will be return customers.
